## Package Import & Data Cleaning
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
load("REE.RData")
```

```{r}
REE <- REE %>%
  mutate(
    ID = factor(ID),
    Obese = factor(Obese, levels = c(0, 1)),
    Ventilator = factor(Ventilator, levels = c(0, 1)),
    ICUorSDU   = factor(ICUorSDU, levels = c("ICU", "SDU")),
    Measurement = as.numeric(Measurement)
  )
```
